profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development expertise, I prioritize leveraging **Golang**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **ReactNative**, and a robust backend with **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. My experience extends across cloud platforms such as **AWS**, utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for CI/CD processes to deliver scalable and efficient microservices architecture. I specialize in integrating AI and machine learning solutions, implementing observability tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Datadog**, and **NewRelic** to enhance application performance and reliability.

I have led successful projects that incorporate **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, and **HuggingFace**, deploying features that leverage advanced AI capabilities for enhanced user experiences. My solid foundation in software engineering ensures that I adhere to compliance frameworks while efficiently managing development workflows using **Git** and **GitLab**. My aim is to build high-performance, secure applications that not only meet but exceed industry standards.
